ch0190_00_ryuki/0101_0701_02_10:
I’m doing great, of course! I’m looking forward
to another rockin’ gig today!
ch0190_00_ryuki/7101_0701_01_10:
Being a “star” means being at the top! I’m always
aiming for the top, any time, any place!
ch0190_00_ryuki/7101_0701_02_10:
Stars from all over the world, like Gym Leaders
and Champions, are gathered here on this island.
ch0190_00_ryuki/7101_0701_03_10:
THAT’S why being at the top on Pasio is such a
big deal!
ch0190_00_ryuki/7102_0701_01_10: My bandmate Turtonator’s shell actually EXPLODES!
ch0190_00_ryuki/7102_0701_02_10:
It goes “BOOM” when we’re playing a show, and
that gets everyone fired up!
ch0190_00_ryuki/7103_0701_01_10:
I’m what you might call a star...but for a while,
nobody was buying my music.
ch0190_00_ryuki/7103_0701_02_10:
I left my hometown and traveled across the sea
to pursue my dream.
ch0190_00_ryuki/7103_0701_03_10:
The world wasn’t ready yet for my awesome
voice. I had to scrape by on the money I made
from Pokémon battles.
ch0190_00_ryuki/7103_0701_04_10:
I really owe it to my Pokémon for getting me
through those tough times.
ch0190_00_ryuki/7104_0701_01_10:
I’ve battled together with my dragon Pokémon in
all sorts of places.
ch0190_00_ryuki/7104_0701_02_10:
After I came to Pasio, I met tons of Dragon-type
specialists who I really respect. They’re
real superstars!
ch0190_00_ryuki/7104_0701_03_10:
It’s a blast to talk about dragon Pokémon
with them.
ch0190_00_ryuki/7104_0701_04_10:
I don’t wanna let ’em down, so I’m gonna belt out
a big dragon roar and make the whole
world mine!
ch0190_00_ryuki/7105_0701_01_10:
So, you’re saying the only way to get stronger is
to train like there’s no tomorrow...
ch0190_00_ryuki/7105_0701_02_10:
I dig you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Looks like
you know what’s important!
ch0190_00_ryuki/7105_0701_03_10:
I’m sure you’re gonna be a superstar someday!
In fact, I guarantee it!
ch0190_00_ryuki/1701_0701_01_10:
I’ve been looking for you, Pasio’s very
own rock star!
ch0190_00_ryuki/1701_0701_02_10:
That’s right, a gift for you! I’ve poured my spirit
into it, too!
ch0190_00_ryuki/1701_0702_01_10:
Actually, I found it after Turtonator let loose with
a blast!
ch0190_00_ryuki/1701_0702_02_10:
It’s still a little hot so be careful not to burn
yourself!
ch0190_00_ryuki/2501_0701_01_10:
Me and my Pokémon have traveled to many
different regions, singing and battling along
the way.
ch0190_00_ryuki/2501_0701_02_10:
I’ve scouted members of my band from Johto,
Unova, and Alola.
ch0190_00_ryuki/2501_0701_03_10:
I had encounters and battles that I could only have
in those places, and I’ll keep those memories with
me forever.
ch0190_00_ryuki/2501_0701_04_10:
Hey, I just thought of something! I’ll put all those
happy and bittersweet memories into a song and
belt it out!
ch0190_00_ryuki/2501_0702_01_10:
Have you ever gone on a journey? If you haven’t,
you should go right out there and do it!
ch0190_00_ryuki/2501_0702_02_10: I’m sure you’d make some awesome memories!
ch0190_00_ryuki/2511_0701_01_10:
Haha, I like that look on your face. It’s like you’re
saying, “You don’t know who I am? Get with
the times, man!”
ch0190_00_ryuki/2511_0701_02_10: You wanna know why I love it?
ch0190_00_ryuki/2511_0701_03_10:
Because it means we can push each other to
greater heights—both as fellow stars
AND Trainers!
ch0190_00_ryuki/2511_0701_04_10:
Meeting you here on Pasio has become my
awesomest memory! I’m absolutely gonna make a
song about it!
ch0190_00_ryuki/2511_0702_01_10:
When my song about my memories with you here
on Pasio is finished...
ch0190_00_ryuki/2511_0702_02_10: I’m gonna sing it just for you!
ch0190_00_ryuki/3001_0701_01_10:
Mornin’, o Star of Pasio! You’re lookin’ like a
rocker down to your core today.
ch0190_00_ryuki/3003_0701_01_10:
Looks like the sun’s out. Good thing, ’cause my
baby’s all fired up to play a set today!
ch0190_00_ryuki/3005_0701_01_10:
The sound of the ocean waves under the
moonlight is like a lullaby for me. Makes me
sleep like a baby.
